document_data.caption: A map showing Corondor's Tower (labeled #5) in northwest Suldolphor.
document_data.name: Corondor's Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Corondor's Tower''' was a tower located in [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]] near the [[Arnaden]].
document_data.Location: The tower was located along the perimeter wall in northwest Suldolphor north of the [[Golden Gate]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Suldolphor}}
document_data.Description: With its own granary, fortified walls, smithy, dungeon, and stables, Elaph's Tower was a fortress in its own right.
document_data.Inhabitants: Corondor's Tower served as a barracks for Suldolphor's elite [[Flame Guard]].
